author: fcouderc
body:
Add to CMSSW the electron/photon energy scale and resolution modifier. This is used at analysis level to  for data/MC discrepancy between energy scale and resolution for EM objects. This also equalizes the energy scale vs time for data.
Below are the plots of the Zee before (top) and after (bottom) applying the corrections. Left plots refer to EB-EB pairs and right plots to EE-EE pairs.

[Zee_uncalib.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/258984/Zee_uncalib.pdf)
[Zee_calib.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/258983/Zee_calib.pdf)
title: Egm smearer 76 x
